sentences.en: A thigh injury increasingly hindered her mobility.
sentences.cn: 大腿受伤使她行动愈发不便。

sentences.en: Another dimension of flexibility and mobility? Or the end of nomadism?
sentences.cn: 是另一种弹性和移动? 还是标志着游牧的结束?

sentences.en: At the same time, we discussed the conductivity mobility spectrum analysis method.
sentences.cn: 同时对电导率迁移率谱这一实验方法也做了较详细的说明.

sentences.en: For many, the movement is one of horizontal mobility rather than vertical.
sentences.cn: 多数运动都是水平运动而不是垂直运动.

sentences.en: Geographers study mobility to understand the spatial distributions of population types.
sentences.cn: 地理学家研究住所迁移是为了了解不同类型的人口的地域分布情况.

sentences.en: Good Mobility. Able to travel as and when required.
sentences.cn: 良好的流动性,能够适应必要的调动.

sentences.en: It disrupted the enemy's communications, supplies, and mobility.
sentences.cn: 它粉碎了敌人的通讯 、 补给及其迁移.

sentences.en: It improves the strength and mobility of joints.
sentences.cn: 它能提高关节的力量和灵活性。

sentences.en: Mobility affects loyalty with the degree of effect depending on branch coverage.
sentences.cn: 流动性对忠诚的影响与分行覆盖面有关.

sentences.en: Mobility is very important in guerrilla warfare.
sentences.cn: 机动性在游击战中至关重要.

sentences.en: Object's place in a tree is defined by effective mobility.
sentences.cn: 有效的mobility定义了物体在树上的位置.

sentences.en: She lost her teeth, hearing, eyesight and mobility.
sentences.cn: 她牙掉光了, 耳朵聋了, 眼睛花了,也动弹不得了.

sentences.en: The difference in regional house prices acts as an obstacle to mobility of labour.
sentences.cn: 不同地区房价的差异阻碍了劳动力的流动.

sentences.en: The mobility value used is that of the minority carrier.
sentences.cn: 所采用的迁移率值都是少子迁移率.

sentences.en: There is greater mobility of labour (= movement of workers ) between jobs and areas.
sentences.cn: 工作岗位之间和地区之间的劳动力流动性更大了。

sentences.en: These will lead to China's economic mobility has declined.
sentences.cn: 这些都会导致中国经济的流动性有所下降.

sentences.en: Your men are stranded. The defenders have all the mobility, the numerical superiority, and the firepower.
sentences.cn: 你的人进退两难.但是守军却有全部的机动性, 有数量上的优势和火力上的优势.

words.tran_cn: 机动的；易变的，；非固定的
[物][通信]移动性；机动性；[电子]迁移率

phrases.tran_cn: [石油]载子移动率；[石油]载流子迁移率
电子迁移率；电子移动性
职业流动性；就业流动性
流度比；迁移率；移动率比

trans.tran_cn: 流动性，移动性，<社>流动，机动性
trans.tran_en: the ability to move easily from one job, area, or social class to another
